properties.description: MIRAI Design District, a planned 57,500-square-foot development, calls for 17 modular retail spaces totaling 15,500 square feet on the first floor, and 41,000 square feet of office space on the second and third floors.
properties.developers: Lionheart Capital, Leviathan Development and Well Duo

properties.description: Kuma’s firm, Kengo Kuma and Associates, is also designing the luxury condominium tower Aman Residences, an 18-story building under construction in the Faena District in Miami Beach. Vlad Doronin’s OKO Group is developing the building with investor Len Blavatnik of Access Industries.
properties.developers: Vlad Doronin's OKO Group, backed by Len Blavatnik of Access Industries

properties.description: Midtown Miami developer Alex Vadia tapped the British design and architecture firm Heatherwick Studio to design the master plan for the redevelopment of the Shops at Sunset Place, a shopping center in South Miami. Vadia’s Midtown Opportunities paid $65.5 million the 10-plus acre property in 2021.

Craig Robins and his partners are working with British architect David Chipperfield on a project in the Miami Design District. They acquired an assemblage of more than 2.5 acres last year where they plan a five-star boutique hotel, condos and luxury retail for the site. It would likely mark Chipperfield’s first project in Miami. He was tapped to design a previous undeveloped version of the Shore Club project when it was owned by HFZ Capital Group.
properties.developers: Miami Design District Associates, Constellation Hotels Holding, Fort Partners and Raycliff Capital

properties.full_address: 2175 and 2251 North Flagler Drive in West Palm Beach
properties.description: The Swiss architecture firm designed 1111 Lincoln Road in Miami Beach and the Pérez Art Museum Miami in downtown Miami.

Related and Integra are co-developing the 152-unit St. Regis Residences, Miami on Brickell Avenue. It will mark Robert A.M. Stern's first residential project in South Florida. The waterfront tower will also include more than 50,000 square feet of amenities.
The 49 luxury condos will be in a new 20-story tower and an eight-story renovated Cromwell House building that was constructed in 1939. The project will also include a single-family beach house.

properties.full_address: 2140 Northwest 12th Avenue, 1243 and 1215 Northwest 21st Street in Miami
properties.description: Developer Robert Wennett tapped Danish starchitect Bjarke Ingels to design his massive mixed-use complex planned in Miami’s Allapattah neighborhood. Wennett’s Miami Produce Center LLC filed plans for an eight-building complex with residential, office, retail, hotel and school components in 2018.

properties.full_address: 1656, 1664, 1676 and 1680 Alton Road, and 1677 West Avenue in Miami Beach
properties.description:
Norman Foster's Foster + Partners is working with Kobi Karp to design Shvo's planned office and residential project on the former Epicure Gourmet Market & Café site on Miami Beach’s Alton Road. 
The six-story development, called the Alton, would consist of roughly 170,000 square feet of office, apartments and nearly 12,000 square feet of retail and 5,000 square feet of restaurant space on the ground floor.

The building will be constructed on the site of the Champlain Towers South collapse in 2021, where 98 people died. Damac paid $120 million for the site as part of a court-ordered sale of the property that closed in 2022.
